channel.title: Auth on Svādhyāya
channel.description: Recent content in Auth on Svādhyāya

item.title: Google Login Using Go and Gin
item.description: In this blog we will learn about how to get started with Golang and create a auth with Google Login. We will be using the Gin and gorm ORM. During my initial uses of Gin I felt for new users the documentation is not friendly enough, hence I decided to write this article. If you are coming from a Python/Ruby world Gin is NOT like Django or Rails. Rather, its more like Flask and Sinatra.
